Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

The Journey of a Digital Pioneer

This is the story of a business leader who has spent over two decades transforming how media companies connect with their audiences in the digital age. Their journey began humbly in 1993 as an Inside Sales Representative, where they quickly discovered their talent for understanding customer needs and driving results. This natural ability led them to become a Sales Manager by 1997, achieving President's Club recognition two years in a row.

As the digital revolution was beginning to reshape business landscapes, they saw an opportunity to be at the forefront of change. In 1999, they took a bold step as E-Products Marketing Manager, spearheading their company's first venture into e-commerce. Their innovative work earned them the Hilti North America's Leadership Award, marking them as a rising star in the digital space.

The early 2000s saw them taking on global responsibilities, managing e-business implementations across 15 major websites worldwide. Under their leadership, e-commerce revenue grew by an astounding 300% annually for three consecutive years. Their success in digital transformation caught the attention of senior leadership, leading to their appointment as a Global Process Expert, where they revolutionized CRM and database marketing strategies across North America.

By 2007, they had evolved into a Director of Product Management, building a world-class team focused on customer-driven innovation. Their impact was immediate and substantial - digital sales grew by 60% in their first year, setting the stage for even greater achievements to come.

The story reached new heights in 2011 when they became Vice-President of Digital Media, managing a $25 million digital business with over 100 websites and 80 mobile apps. Their leadership resulted in a remarkable 10x increase in digital sales over five years.

Today, as Vice-President of Data and Marketing Technology, they're writing their latest chapter, leading their organization's transformation into a data-driven marketing powerhouse. They're particularly proud of launching Orchestrate, an in-house startup focusing on marketing funnel automation for B2B markets.

Throughout their career, they've maintained a passionate commitment to helping organizations and people transform, grow, and thrive. Their unique blend of strategic thinking, marketing expertise, and technological understanding has consistently delivered results across continents and companies.

Armed with an MBA in Marketing from Oklahoma State University and a BBA in Finance from Northeastern State University, they've combined formal education with hands-on experience to become a true digital transformation leader. Their story is one of continuous evolution, always staying ahead of the curve in an ever-changing digital landscape.
